channel.description:
[code]------------------- Updater 3.0 - By Nueb35 -------------------
Downloading runescape.jar... Done, downloaded 712 KB.
Loading classes... Done, loaded 289 classes.
Downloading loader.jar... Done, downloaded 24 KB.
Replacing classes... - Replacing : dj - Replacing : eh - Replacing : fb - Replacing : ne Done
Loading hooks... Done, loaded 10 hooks.
Naming classes... Done, named 10 classes.
- Animable ^ ug implements com.nsbot.hooks.Animable - Character ^ ob implements com.nsbot.hooks.Character - ob.getMessage() returns ob.P - ob.getAnimation() returns ob.bb - ob.getMotion() returns ob.F - ob.getLocationX() returns ob.L - ob.getLocationY() returns ob.ac - client.getBaseX() returns hk.e - client.getBaseY() returns vj.t - Client ^ client implements com.nsbot.hooks.Client - client.getLoginIndex() returns tf.C - client.getCanvas() returns pe.S - client.getUsername() returns ga.G - client.getPassword() returns ga.F - Interface ^ aj implements com.nsbot.hooks.Interface - aj.getChildren() returns aj.pb - client.getInterfaceArray() returns fk.ab - Keyboard ^ vb implements com.nsbot.hooks.Keyboard - client.getKeyboard() returns li.t - Mouse ^ uk implements com.nsbot.hooks.Mouse - client.getMouseX() returns r.P - client.getMouseY() returns ha.d - client.getMouse() returns ai.g - client.getIdleTime() returns je.ib - client.getMousePressX() returns je.ab - client.getMousePressY() returns bi.j - client.getMousePressTime() returns tk.g - client.getMousePressButton() returns ob.Ib - NPC ^ bk implements com.nsbot.hooks.NPC - client.getNPCIndexArray() returns fi.n - client.getNPCArray() returns uc.l - client.getNPCCount() returns ed.d - bk.getDefinition() returns bk.mc - NPCDef ^ ja implements com.nsbot.hooks.NPCDef - ja.getName() returns ja.r - ja.getActions() returns ja.F - ja.getType() returns ja.G - Player ^ pb implements com.nsbot.hooks.Player - client.getPlayerIndexArray() returns ad.h - client.getPlayerArray() returns tf.J - client.getPlayerCount() returns fe.R - client.getMyPlayer() returns te.g - pb.getName() returns pb.Gc - StringWrapper ^ id implements com.nsbot.hooks.StringWrapper - id.length() returns id.c - id.getBytes() returns id.A - id.isEditable() returns id.E
Done.
Packing jar... Done.
------------------- Client version : #530 Identified 10 classes. Hooked 37 fields. ------------------- [/code]
all tested, etc.
damn, the class replacing did not replace class "k", my test acc will be banned soon D: right?

item.dc:creator: @abrahm2119 abrahm2119
item.description:
@abrahm2119 wrote:

[quote=“qauters, post:48, topic:258986”][quote author=abrahm2119 link=topic=341986.msg2660354#msg2660354 date=1234138958]

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=341986.msg2660346#msg2660346 date=1234138667]

I started this updater a couple of days ago:

[code]

RS Updater - abraham2119

Update version: #530
Downloaded runescape.jar (712KB)

Client.getApplet() - fb.o
Client.getSocket() - se.p
Client.getCanvas() - pe.S
Client.getKeyboard() - li.t

Mouse.getX() - r.P
Mouse.getY() - ha.d
Mouse.getClickedX() - je.ab
Mouse.getClickedY() - bi.j

Finished in 27484 ms![/code]
It’s pretty slow though.

EDIT: Pwnd, the fields I hooked were EXTREMELY easy to hook.

[/quote]27 seconds? go kill yourself

but seriously, FUCKING SERIOUSLY, it doesnt matter how long it takes as long as it works, every other dickhead that is boasting about speed has had theirs identify things incorrectly
[/quote]I know.

Although, I am pretty sure the fields I’ve hooked will work; I tested them on the past 4 client versions (527, 528, 529, 530) and they worked correctly.

Doesn’t matter, I had hooks working for 20 revisions or more before the broke.

I do think 27s is including downloading / dumping ;)[/quote]obviously is

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Metho_D Method
item.description:
@Metho_D wrote:

The NPC and Player arrays and counts are pretty easy to hook because the both work off of a very similar pattern (the string “gpp2 pos:” vs. “gnp2 pos:” and the " size:" string). There are others, too, but once you see how the basics of finding them works you should be able to look for others.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Can someone make a minor list of things that were easy for them to hook? (Excluding the class that handles strings 'cause that’s easy as fuk)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

nueb35:

speaking of bad naming, RSString, that is wrong as jagex uses the same String class on funorb aswell

It was OK, till they released funorb ^^. Anyway, I would call it JagString or something like that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

There is no right or wrong, until we see an un-obfuscated client we can only speculate and use our knowledge to name classes in an informative manner.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

nueb35:

speaking of bad naming, RSString, that is wrong as jagex uses the same String class on funorb aswell

That’s stupid, I’m not working with funorb, only RS. It’s not Sun’s string class, so I just called it RSString.
Like a few notable people have said, it’s named for me, and only me.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Metho_D Method
item.description:
@Metho_D wrote:

[quote=“illusion_, post:25, topic:258986”][quote author=Metho D link=topic=341986.msg2645659#msg2645659 date=1233200589]


[ Bank ]
 * getBankItemIndex() --> field int aj.bc
 * getBankItemID() --> field int aj.yc
 * getBankItemStackSize() --> field int aj.xc
 * getBankItemActions() --> field id[] aj.Yc
 * getBankItemName() --> field id aj.r

[/quote]

Those hooks really aren’t named correctly. They are not specific to the bank. They work for all TabbedInterfaces. Example, these hooks will work for the Magic tab and Shop Interface. And “ItemName” and “ItemActions” don’t only pertain to “Items”. ;)[/quote]

Ok, I’ll rename those also (probably badly, but they’ll get the point across anyways). I wasn’t aware they worked for other tabbed interfaces because we had only tested them with the bank. Thanks for pointing that out.

Read full topic

  • getBankItemID() --> field int aj.yc
  • getBankItemStackSize() --> field int aj.xc
  • getBankItemActions() --> field id[] aj.Yc
  • getBankItemName() --> field id aj.r

[/code][/quote]

Those hooks really aren’t named correctly. They are not specific to the bank. They work for all TabbedInterfaces. Example, these hooks will work for the Magic tab and Shop Interface. And “ItemName” and “ItemActions” don’t only pertain to “Items”.
